Subhojyoti Mukherjee


I am a first year Ph.D. candidate in the College of Information and Computer Sciences, University of Massachusetts Amherst from Fall, 2018. Prevously, I was an M.S (Research) scholar in the Computer Science and Engineering Department, IIT Madras from January, 2015 to January, 2018. I was advised by Dr. Balaraman Ravindran (CSE Department, IIT Madras) and Dr. Nandan Sudarsanam (Department of Management Studies, IIT Madras). I was associated with the RISE lab at IIT Madras. I worked in the area of stochastic and non-stocahstic Multi-Armed Bandit settings.

I completed my B.Tech from Meghnad Saha Institute of Technology, Kolkata under West Bengal University of Technology on 2013.
